name: Murdlok
overview: Liberate the land from the evil Murdlok! Reflection, not recklessness will guide you to your goal! Murdlok is a previously unreleased graphical text-based adventure game for the Commodore 64 written in 1986 by Peter Hempel. A German and an English version exist. It was translated in 2018 into English by Lisa Brodner and Michael Steil Source: https://www.pagetable.com/?p=940
